note: Measured using best-of-5 Global Distance Test, which scores the similarity between a predicted protein structure and the actual structure.
title: Protein folding prediction accuracy
subtitle:
Median accuracy of predictions in the free modeling category for the best team in each year's Critical Assessment of Protein Structure (CASP) competition. Ranges from 0â€“100 (100 = best).
Large advances were made in 2018 and 2020 by [DeepMind's AlphaFold](https://www.deepmind.com/research/highlighted-research/alphafold) AI systems.
